topics.body:
So I'm watching Pat and Woolie play Parasite Eve and he's talking about Scientist saying Dinosaurs had Feathers? 

Since when?
topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5

topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54fa474163687270717f0200#post_54fa474163687270717f0200
I think since last year. There's been new evidence recovered suggesting that Dinos had feathers. Not for flight or anything. I'm not a biologist but if I had to guess I'd say that the feathers helped in thermoregulation.
